programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Antons little toasty body disintegrates during a swim class. When Gumball and Darwin see Anton the next day, as good as new, they set out to discover his secret. It turns out that his parents use a special formula to bake new Antons when necessary. So the kids test it out at home and end up baking a clone army whose leader - Ant-one - wants to destroy Anton and take over the world.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: After begging Dad for a puppy, the kids are taken aback when he comes home with a turtle. Despite the fact that the turtle turns out to be extremely aggressive (especially toward Gumball) they try their best to give it the love it deserves. This achieves nothing. The Evil Turtle escapes and goes on a rampage, and they have to find it before it destroys Elmore.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When Mom reveals that Gumballs real name is "Zach", Gumball adopts a cheesy, annoying persona to match the name. His family try to make him remember the old Gumball, as this new Zach persona is progressively taking over Gumballs life and erasing his memories. If they cant reach him in time, the old Gumball will disappear forever and theyll be left with Zach!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Nothing much is happening for Gumball and Darwin and the background characters in Elmore seize their moment. An array of diverse characters you may have noticed lurking in the background of Gumball and Darwins adventures finally let their voices be heard. A series of sketches include some tennis crowd extras, two pizzas in love and The Bacon Guy.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball is in such a bad mood that it spreads to Darwin, who joins him in complaining about everything. Their constant moaning grabs the attention of the good people of Elmore. Mistaking Gumball and Darwin for genuine kids in need, they put on a benefit and raise money for them. How do Gumball and Darwin confess theres been a mix-up without inciting a riot?!!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When Gumball and Darwin discover his diploma is fake, Principal Brown is determined to keep their discovery a secret. He offers them all sorts of "incentives" to keep quiet but the truth is they really dont care whether the diploma is real or not. Mistaking their disinterest as "playing hard to get" Principal Brown resorts to increasingly desperate measures to ensure Gumball and Darin play ball.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin start noticing small details around Elmore High that dont add up. They come to the conclusion that Molly has disappeared, even though nobody else remembers her ever having existed. Mr Small confirms their suspicions and tells them that things are not always what they seem in Elmore. They set off on a quest to rescue Molly in an alternate dimension, and soon need rescuing themselves!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: After a health scare the kids decide to reunite Mr Robinson with his son. Mr Robinson has always seen Rocky as a disappointment so when Gumball and Darwin help him land a corporate job at Chanax, he is thrilled. However the Chanax corporation is not quite what it seems. Can Gumball and Darwin rescue Rocky before he becomes a corporate drone for all eternity?

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball

When the Beaver Brothers hire the Looney Builders to build a log cabin for them, they soon cause the job to be neglected by goofing around too much.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When a little cat and mouse ends poorly for Tom, he ends up having to wear the cone of shame. Unable to remove it, deal with the emotional shame, or adapt to the giant plastic funnel on his head, Tom must find meaning in the suffering.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A little cat and mouse leads Jerry to take refuge in his hole in the wall where he runs into Franky Two-Face the rat, who now calls Jerrys home, HIS home. Tom finds this funny, of course. Franky Two-Face leads Tom to believe the two are working together but Frankys a no-good, dirty rat. He doesnt play fair. Hes a liar, a sneak, a dirty player, just an all-around dirty rat. He goes to the cats in the alley, says Jerry thinks theyre soft, steals things from Spike and sets Tom up as the thief. Franky Two-Face knows every dirty trick in the book, except one; the one Tom and Jerry use to get rid of Franky Two-Face.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After another destructive bout of cat and mouse, Hildie and Beatie decide that Toms bad cat-titude has caused nothing but trouble around the cottage. What Tom needs is an attitude adjustment! With a flick of the wand, Tom becomes a doting cat. Much better! Jerrys loving the change at first, but he soon tires of the touchy-feely feline (even Newt is tiring of Toms affections). Jerry tries every mouse trick in the book to trigger Toms animal instincts, but nothing seems to break the spell. Jerry has to sneak Hildies wand to reverse the spell, but it wont be easy with tag-along-Tom by his side every step of the way!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.sub-title: Someones in the Kitchen with Mynah
programme.desc: Ginger brings home a new pet—a mynah bird who can mimic anyone and anything. Rick complains about the money they will have to spend to feed and care for another pet. Spike and Tom are on notice, as somebodys got to go.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Its that special time of year when the Lady of the Houses rare, exotic (and very stinky) cheese gets delivered to the manor. Its up to Tom to make sure not a crumb of this cheese—known to be a favorite of mice—goes missing.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Ginger decides she wants to teach Tom to walk on a leash to ensure he gets much-needed exercise. Tom hates the leash and does not want to go for a walk. Finally, theyre on their way, much to Toms chagrin. Back home, Jerry and Tuffy proceed to raid the fridge.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Slippys attempts to impress his cousins with constellation drawings goes awry, causing them to get lost in a nebula! As the nebula messes with their racers and gadgets, escape becomes hopeless. Its up to Ella and Madhu to find a way to guide them safely back home!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: When Space Junk smashes into their clubhouse, Ella and Slippy set off to fix the problem. While Ella wants to be rid of the junk, Slippys determined to reuse or at least recycle it. When Ella is trapped, re-using space junk may be the only way to save her!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: The gang is playing tag the Meteoroid when Glitch fails to follow Slippys instruction. He soon realises its because Glitch saw the comet hes been tracking for months! Slippy is excited - he gets to tag a comet!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ella and Slippy are perfecting their triple corkscrews when Priya, Ellas best friend from Earth, surprises her with a visit. Priya performs a perfect triple corkscrew to everyones amazement. Ella is frustrated that she still cant nail it

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: When a friendly game accidentally breaks Maggie, Ella and co set out to find a rare metal to help fix her. But its a metal so rare its only in asteroids! After a few unsuccessful attempts, they realize the knowledge Maggie gave them before she broke could help save the day!

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Ratty tries to teach Mole, Hedge and Toad the rules of poetry but loses Hedges poem in the strong wind. / Kingfisher is singing a very irritating song, to everyones annoyance. Only Chief Weasel appreciates the song because he can use it to get Tinker and Smudge to obey him.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Kingfisher is singing a very irritating song, to everyones annoyance. Only Chief Weasel appreciates the song because he can use it to get Tinker and Smudge to obey him. But will Kingfisher now ever be able to leave the Wild Woods?

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Mole is making his winter supply of jam but its Portlys birthday and Mole very generously gives everyone a jar of jam to give to Portly for a birthday present. Soon he has none left for winter. And Portly has rather a lot of jam!

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Its the Midsummer Festival and everyone is contributing to it, with Badger as the master of ceremonies, the Jack of the Green. But when he finds himself trapped in his own home, how can the festival start?

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Everyone is too busy to play with Toad so he foolishly opens the lock gates in order to propel his new boat. But this creates a giant wave that demolishes the Otters holt downstream. Toad must now repair their home, finding help from an unexpected quarter.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesnt have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises its a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesnt go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity supply is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees the cost of her enormous electricity bill. As the snow falls outside Mr Beans flat becomes so cold that there are ice cubes in his bath water. Mr Bean has the idea to build a huge wind turbine in the back garden providing his own power. All is going very well until an unexpected storm sends Beans wind turbine into overdrive creating a huge surge of electricity and a huge shock for everyone

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesnt have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he cant remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine theres only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Beans main concern is to get some money and get back to the bakers before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own "No Littering" signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Slippys attempts to impress his cousins with constellation drawings goes awry, causing them to get lost in a nebula! As the nebula messes with their racers and gadgets, escape becomes hopeless. Its up to Ella and Madhu to find a way to guide them safely back home!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: When Space Junk smashes into their clubhouse, Ella and Slippy set off to fix the problem. While Ella wants to be rid of the junk, Slippys determined to reuse or at least recycle it. When Ella is trapped, re-using space junk may be the only way to save her!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: The gang is playing tag the Meteoroid when Glitch fails to follow Slippys instruction. He soon realises its because Glitch saw the comet hes been tracking for months! Slippy is excited - he gets to tag a comet!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ella and Slippy are perfecting their triple corkscrews when Priya, Ellas best friend from Earth, surprises her with a visit. Priya performs a perfect triple corkscrew to everyones amazement. Ella is frustrated that she still cant nail it

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: When a friendly game accidentally breaks Maggie, Ella and co set out to find a rare metal to help fix her. But its a metal so rare its only in asteroids! After a few unsuccessful attempts, they realize the knowledge Maggie gave them before she broke could help save the day!

programme.title: Toomas ja sõbrad
programme.sub-title: Train School: The Height of Courage
programme.desc: Faced with a super-high bridge on the way to a parade of brave engines, Percy has to find the courage within himself to cross.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Mole is making his winter supply of jam but its Portlys birthday and Mole very generously gives everyone a jar of jam to give to Portly for a birthday present. Soon he has none left for winter. And Portly has rather a lot of jam!

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Its the Midsummer Festival and everyone is contributing to it, with Badger as the master of ceremonies, the Jack of the Green. But when he finds himself trapped in his own home, how can the festival start?

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Everyone is too busy to play with Toad so he foolishly opens the lock gates in order to propel his new boat. But this creates a giant wave that demolishes the Otters holt downstream. Toad must now repair their home, finding help from an unexpected quarter.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Toad installs a new Mauss security system to protect Toad Hall from the weasels but Toads arrogance and rudeness towards Mauss leaves Toad locked out of Toad Hall for good. Only a big mouse sized apology can put things right.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Toad shows off his new hammock but refuses to let anyone else have a nap in it. The weasels trap Toad in the hammock, leaving Toad Hall wide open for them. Can Toads friends use the hammock to regain Toad Hall?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have decided to organize a race with two sand yachts they found on the beach. The only thing missing, is a worthy adversary. They put Grizzy, who was taking a nap, on one of the yachts without waking him up. And the race is off. Grizzy wakes up in shock onboard his sand yacht.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy has run out of ideas to open his coconut until he sees the Lemmings new friend the crab open one with a simple snip of the claw. He confiscates the crustacean and uses it to take the tops off his coconuts. As they fight over the crab, the characters discover a remote-control device in a secret grotto that operates a giant crab. Grizzy takes over the controls, but the Lemmings want to play with the joystick too!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A helicopter takes off from the beach, leaving behind installations for a TV game, namely lots of food supplies - which are locked up. To access the keys and the food, participants must win team tests under the surveillance of a drone. The Lemmings are the yellow team. The red team is comprised of Grizzy, an oar, and a flabbergasted crab!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While trying to avoid the Lemmings outboard speedboat, Grizzy punctures his air mattress and is propelled into a hidden grotto where he finds a conch decorated with Maori symbols that can control whales. Grizzy returns, proudly straddling his cetacean and chases the Lemmings from his peaceful spot. But the Lemmings imagination is equal to the size of this potential new playmate!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While arguing over a jar of Yummy, Grizzy and the Lemmings happen upon a polar bear cub who is crying. When the little bear sees them, he wails even louder. Annoyed by his sobs, Grizzy and the rodents try to pacify him, but nothing works. After feeding and changing him, the baby finally falls asleep. How can they pick up their Yummy battle without waking the cub?

programme.title: Superthings Rivals of Kaboom, Kazoom Power
programme.desc: Power Punch signs up for the strength tournament and blows everyone away. But his power causes an earthquake that threatens to destroy Kaboom City.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. Moxie Manatee hires the Looney Builders to build an obstacle course for the Sandy Shells Preschool Games, but Lola isnt listening to her crew.

programme.title: Krypto Saves the Day!
programme.desc: When a black cat crosses Kryptos path, hes determined to catch it before Halloween night is through.

programme.title: Krypto Saves the Day!
programme.desc: Krypto smells something special in a holiday package, and in his eagerness to grab the gift he makes a mess of Metropoliss festivities.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Batwings favorite Bat-Net gets ripped during a chase with Riddler, she must learn to let go of her old net (despite it being her favorite) if shes going to help Batman stop the Riddler in his tracks.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Clayface, Gotham Citys messiest villain, arrives to cause trouble during Gothams annual Clean Up Day. Redbird must overcome his fear of taking baths if hes going to help Bam bring Clayface to justice.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom must compete with his American cousin for the right to remain a Butler at Postlewaite manor. / Tom and Jerry are forced to go back to Detective School in order to renew their detective licenses. / When Tom inadvertently set a Yeti loose on the town Jerry Van Mouseling must subdue the beast. / Tom serves an evil pirate determined to steal treasure belonging to the village mice until Jerry Van Mouseling foils his plans. / Tom turns into a Blob monster and proceeds to eat everything in sight including the village mice! Jerry Van Mouseling to the rescue! / Rick and Ginger leave town with instructions for Tom to keep the house in order but Jerrys got other ideas. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A werewolf terrorizes Tom and the inhabitants of the Catsylvania village.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom is obsessed with the sound of his new crinkle ball.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are hired to find a missing priceless Maltese Pigeon.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom enlists the help of the lake monster to help terrorise the mouse village.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Mice visitors from Mars force Tom to change the way he treats Jerry.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. After Mrs Wickets house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is tidying his flat and chucking out a load of old unwanted junk. Unfortunately during the big clear out Teddy accidentally falls into a bin bag which gets put out in the street. Bean is horrified when the rubbish van arrives and he realises that dear old Teddy is now on his way to the landfill. Bean races across town to the dump but how will he ever find his friend amongst all the mountains of junk?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a robot to clean his flat, but it ends up trashing half the town.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van. But by the time he gets to the front of the queue the ice-cream man has gone to lunch. Bean takes it upon himself to climb through in an open window and into the back of the van from where he starts to help himself. Unfortunately he soon attracts a crowd and is forced to serve a long queue of kids until all the ice cream runs out. When the ice-cream man comes back from lunch and drives away he is unaware that Bean is still hiding in the back of his van en route to the ice cream factory.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isnt invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party - even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Beans attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside. Irma is travelling light but Bean wants to take almost everything his owns in an enormous trunk. Arriving at the seaside Beans trunk gets accidentally swapped with a trunk belonging to a famous stage magician. As Bean entertains Irma pulling rabbits out of hats the angry magician arrives on the scene - and hes not a happy bunny.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves playing in the neighbourhood soft play centre - bouncing on the trampolines whizzing down the slides and most of all immersing himself in the ball pool. But he doesnt like sharing the place with all those annoying kids. So Bean decides to turn his flat into his own private play area where he can play in peace. Unfortunately Irma Mrs Wicket and The Bruisers all want to join in the fun with him.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he cant refuse.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: An animated series following the antics of a cat named Tom - who is always in pursuit of a mouse named Jerry - and the rivalry between the two characters. A lemur belonging to the Duchess adventurous cousin puts Toms job as an under-butler in jeopardy.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: An animated series following the antics of a cat named Tom - who is always in pursuit of a mouse named Jerry - and the rivalry between the two characters. programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry must prevent the entire city blowing up.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Jerry uses a friendly tick to get even with Tom.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: An animated series following the antics of a cat named Tom - who is always in pursuit of a mouse named Jerry - and the rivalry between the two characters. The detectives try to help a team of huskies find the villain determined to sabotage their dog sled race.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: An animated series following the antics of a cat named Tom - who is always in pursuit of a mouse named Jerry - and the rivalry between the two characters. Tom, Jerry and Rick try to relax in an automatic chair, only to cause mayhem outside.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Whos afraid of daft films about giant killer cats, blobs from outer space and thumb-size men who dance around in sugar bowls? Mr. Bean is. Hes very afraid. A trip to the cinema makes Mr. Beans imagination play tricks on him.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Against his better judgement, Bean has agreed to go out on a proper date with Irma Gobb, his girlfriend. She has the perfect evening planned: a romantic film followed by a candlelit dinner for two. If only she had the perfect boyfriend to go with it.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves playing in the neighbourhood soft play centre - bouncing on the trampolines whizzing down the slides and most of all immersing himself in the ball pool. But he doesnt like sharing the place with all those annoying kids. So Bean decides to turn his flat into his own private play area where he can play in peace. Unfortunately Irma Mrs Wicket and The Bruisers all want to join in the fun with him.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he cant refuse.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph. After failing to get one from a photo booth he tries numerous other ways to get his photo taken including photobombing a tourists snap. None of these work but after Bean is arrested maybe the police can assist him. Say cheese!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants to impress Irma by entering them both into a dance competition at the local park. But his tango is terrible and his rumba ridiculous so he enrols for lessons at a local dance school. After an unsuccessful class at the dance studio and a trip to the library to teach himself Mr Bean has lost track of time. He needs to make it up to a disgruntled Irma but will his homemade effort "win" her over.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is locked in a department store overnight and has the time of his life. / Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. / Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. / Mr Bean dog sits for Irma and gets the idea for a new dog-walking business - how hard can it be?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. But as luck would have it, he arrives at the shop at closing time to discover that tomorrow there will be a special sale. All he has to do is be first in line …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. He is forced to dress up as Mrs. Wicket when Brian the Delivery Man wont deliver the chair to anyone but Mrs. Wicket. Then Brian falls in love with "her" and asks "her" out on a date. Bean accepts because hes starving hungry. How long can he keep up the deception? Long enough to fill his stomach?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Animation based on the highly popular live action series of the same name, with many of the same characters including the hapless Mr. Bean himself, his long-suffering girlfriend Irma Gobb, Teddy and the mysterious driver of the Reliant Supervan. Two new characters appear, Beans landlady Mrs Wicket and her evil one-eyed moggy Scrapper. The series features little actual dialogue, just the famous mumblings and mild slapstick.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput cant stop reading and gets caught! Back at the lab, the story intrigues everyone who is brought on a captivating adventure - featuring Lamput, Specs and Skinny in the leading role of a classic folktale. Robinput and his mates fight evil dictatorship for the perfect bedtime story.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Theres Football Fever as the Docs and Lamput go to watch the game! In the second half of the game, they end up on the pitch! Lamput causes havoc for the Docs as he disguises himself as flags, jerseys, whistles and even the football, but as they get closer to the 90th minute, they realise that its a team effort to win, and the game needs everyone to be on the same side.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The premiere event on the fashion calendar is about to begin!! The Docs chase Lamput in through the stage door and bring the tone way down. Before you know it everyones embarked upon a short and exceedingly painful catwalk career. This seasons colour: orange. The Docs try their hand at lighting design. They suck at that, too. The blue nerds get ejected hard by venue security, and Lamput becomes the hit look of the show. So versatile! So changeable! One size fits all!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput escapes from the Lab, the Boss gives the job of orange-blob-retrieval to Doc Specs and Doc Skinny, who turn out to really suck at orange-blob-retrieval. Lamput gives them the slip again and again, and, true to form, the Docs decide to blame their tools. They convince the Boss to let them use more and more expensive vehicles, using an age-old corporate strategy commonly referred to as "diminishing returns". For scientists, these dudes sure are slow learners.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Mac Gopher to build a hot air balloon for him and Tosh to ride in for a festival. Tosh keeps his fear of flying to himself and tries to weigh down the build to avoid liftoff.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Yosemite Sam to build a dude ranch. Sam hurries the crew along, negatively impacting their work.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. Bibi doesnt think that she can help Batgirl any more when she has a terrible no-good day where she keeps messing up and lets Joker get away.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. Batwing is unable to save Batman from a sunken ship trap set by Penguin after refusing to practise with her new underwater mode.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are hired by a bad magician to find out where his pigeon friend disappeared during a magic trick gone wrong. Their investigation leads them to discover the pigeon. Unfortunately he really believes his friend has magic powers and is waiting for magic to bring him back. At the end of the day its the power of friendship that solves this case.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Tom and Butch compete for the Golden Fez and a chance to be top cat in the United Mouse Catchers they must prove their worth by finally catching Jerry. Butch finds out that Jerry is a tough opponent and also finds that living with Spike and Tyke is no piece of cake.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry
programme.sub-title: Tom and Jerry: Santas Little Helpers
programme.desc: Everyones favorite cat-and-mouse duo, Tom and Jerry, is joined by Nibbles Mouse, aka Tuffy, as they ring in a wild wintertime celebration in the all-new holiday special Santas Little Helpers. Jerry and Tuffy are living the good life in Santas workshop -- until the day Tom is rescued by the Claus family! With Tom in the house, theres nothing but merry mayhem at the North Pole. But when the dust settles, can the comically destructive duo work together to save Christmas and learn the true meaning of friendship? Directed by Darrel Van Citters and written by Jim Praytor and Robert Zappia, this wacky Tom and Jerry outing features the voice talents of Tom Kenny, Gary Cole, Simon Helberg, Julie Wittner, Grey DeLisle and Rachael MacFarlane.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry
programme.desc: Its another hot and humid day in Singapore. Cool down with Tom and Jerry by the beach as they chase each other into a frenzy for an icy delight - Ice Kachang!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean finds himself babysitting a baboon.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wickets flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. After Mrs Wickets house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Whos afraid of daft films about giant killer cats, blobs from outer space and thumb-size men who dance around in sugar bowls? Mr. Bean is. Hes very afraid. A trip to the cinema makes Mr. Beans imagination play tricks on him.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: Jerry sneaks into the party set up to steal some cheese while Tom is sleeping. Tom wakes up and chases Jerry across a table filled with all kinds of food. During the chase, Tom eats a melon which turns him into a sphere shape and Jerry eats a piece of cheese which turns him into a triangle shape.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy watches the Lemmings shave ice from the icefield and whip it into granita, but the result is flavorless. He decides to make granita in an empty jar of Yummy so that the chocolate left over on the sides of the jar will flavor the dessert. Its delicious! The Lemmings, who consider it was their recipe, swap the chocolate granita with another one made in an old flowerpot with potting soil. The choco-granito race is off and running!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are starving for their reserves are depleted and their fishing has been unsuccessful. Fortunately, a truck delivers a crate of edibles to the research station that contains compact food cubes. When placed under a special light beam, the cubes retransform into delicious meals. Grizzy discovers that the decompressing lamp can, conversely, compact organic elements too. For example, the Lemmings.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings pace around the log cabin searching for virtual animals to capture with their tablet game. Annoyed by their behavior, Grizzy throws them outside. Determined to continue playing, the Lemmings trick the bear. But when the tablet hits the circuit breaker and explodes, the gaming animals come to life! Ice dinosaurs, laser caribous and giant carnivorous plants. The life-size hunt can begin!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A snowstorm rips the solar panels off the log cabin and Grizzy can no longer watch TV or enjoy the comforts of home! But he has a brilliant idea. He produces electricity by making a caribou run on a treadmill, using the last carrot in the house as bait. But the Lemmings absolutely want his carrot to make the perfect snowman.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers in shock that the TV has been replaced with a trompe-loeil image. Furious, he flushes the Lemmings out of their hiding place where theyd hoped to watch their favorite cartoon in peace and propels them as far as possible. They land in an ancient cave where a powerful spirit capable of entering individuals is asleep. The Lemmings decide to free the spirit and send it to Grizzy. But will they be able to control the spirit?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Not easy to enjoy a DVD about salmon when the Lemmings are having a disco party right there. Grizzy sends them packing with such force that they land at the research station, where they discover a state-of-the-art U.V. cabin. When turned up to the max, the light therapy and music options can advantageously replace the disco equipment Grizzy destroyed. The noise they make causes a block of ice to break off. It hurdles down the slope to the cabin and destroys Grizzys TV. But it doesnt take the bear long to figure out that the U.V. cabin also has a DVD function.

programme.title: Superthings Rivals of Kaboom, Kazoom Power
programme.desc: Hot Hot makes all the food extremely spicy and the accumulated heat threatens to blow up Professor Ks volcano.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Peter, a pretentious cheapskate poodle, demands that Tom and Jerry help protect his precious sapphire egg on a train journey but wont pay their fare. The cat and mouse become stowaways and go to a lot of trouble to do their job, but the outcome is unexpected.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: As Jerry and Tuffy play marbles, Tom throws a soccer ball in their direction and upsets the game. This sparks a chase between Tom and Jerry, and Jerry takes cover in a room that looks like a giant chessboard. As more chess pieces show up, Tom and Jerry attempt their best to outplay them.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry detectives work on a case where they must transport a precious egg on a train, and protect it from several people who want to steal it for their own. / Tom and Jerry work with a very hungry pig to hunt for truffles. / Tom is framed for a crime he did not commit and is sent to prison. Jerry works to clear his name. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Because of an injured foot, Rick stays home with Gingers mother, Rosemary, taking care of him. Rosemary brings her infamous fat-free-dairy-free whole wheat gravy, and she quickly puts Rick, Spike and Tom on nutritious diets. Antics and fights break out as Rick and the pets crave real food.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry take a case for Toodles cousin in Hawaii, hoping to sneak in some rest and relaxation, but its no vacation. The cousins missing pineapple plant is only the starting place of the investigation as Tom and Jerry track down the culprit in this tropical environment.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.sub-title: Little Quacker and Mister Fuzzy Hide
programme.desc: When the witches herb garden is ruined, Tom sets a trap to catch the culprit. Kwaker helps him but turns out to be the culprit himself. Little Quaker keeps turning into "Giant Quaker" and Tom and Jerry make a soup to get him back to normal. Ultimately, it turns out that Giant Quaker had changed into Little Quaker and not the other way around.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesnt have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises its a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesnt go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity supply is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees the cost of her enormous electricity bill. As the snow falls outside Mr Beans flat becomes so cold that there are ice cubes in his bath water. Mr Bean has the idea to build a huge wind turbine in the back garden providing his own power. All is going very well until an unexpected storm sends Beans wind turbine into overdrive creating a huge surge of electricity and a huge shock for everyone

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesnt have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he cant remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine theres only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Beans main concern is to get some money and get back to the bakers before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself lumbered with an unwanted pet in the form of a four-legged ball of pink fur with piggy eyes and a penchant for earthworms. Encyclopedias leave him none the wiser as to the identity of the pesky creature but Bean cant bring himself to just abandon it. The puzzle is eventually solved after a picnic in the park and a raid on the local pet shop.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The fridge in the cabin has changed: its been replaced by a brand new state-of-the-art appliance which analyzes the body fat percentage of whoever wants to serve himself, before selecting the appropriate foodstuffs. For Grizzy, no question of touching the chocolate spread or sodas! Instead, to the Lemmings delight, the fridge transforms into an extreme exercise machine.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a demonstration of balloon modelling on TV. He decides to make a balloon poodle to offer the she-bear hes enamored with. By observing Grizzy the Lemmings discover with enthusiasm that you can blow up modelling balloons far more than regular ones and that they end up exploding in a shower of tattered strips.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud

The Lemmings have covered their bodies in Velcro and are throwing themselves against a doormat, which serves as their target. Grizzy finds peace and quiet by getting rid of the doormat until the Lemmings realize that bear fur is an ideal support for Velcro.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud

Masha acts like a real Robin Hood. She wants to help this lost soul to return home. Meanwhile, the Wolves are trying to get to our guest. / This is a very long car ride! What fun things can we look for out the window that will make the time go faster? / Tom and Jerry mistake burglars loot for a bag of donuts.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Ginger leaves some frozen fish on the kitchen counter to thaw. Ginger and Rick warn Tom to keep his paws away, or he will not get anything to eat. programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Up to their usual antics, Tom, Jerry and Spike get into monkey business with a drone at Rick and Gingers house.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

But Grizzy, determined to get the dish back at any cost, must confront the magnetism of the meteorite and the fury of the Lemmings, for the rodents are set on playing.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have set up a long line of dominos in the cabin that ends with several giant ice blocks and a rocket outside. Weary of not finding the peace and calm he loves so dearly, Grizzy sabotages the game. The rocket hits an ice block and blows up the cabin. Grizzy gets his hands on a machine that can sculpt ice. The bear dreams of an igloo, but the Lemmings have other projects.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings find an ice block outside the log cabin that holds a frozen prehistoric animal: a saber-toothed racoon. Softened, the Lemmings free the creature and try to tame it like a kitten. But the raccoon is like a whirlwind. Grizzy wakes up and discovers the cabin topsy-turvy and flies into a rage. But when the bear tries to kick the rodents out, the wild raccoon challenges him.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: By chance, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a container filled with metal survival food flasks. Primarily filled with vegetables, they do not find favor with the bear, who is more interested in the hi-tech equipment at the rear of the container. Behind his back, the Lemmings find a flask of Yummy and skedaddle with it. But how will they escape Grizzy equipped with his sophisticated gear?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: In a trunk, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a big chocolate egg with a surprise inside. They are licking their lips. As they fight, they accidentally send the coveted egg flying amidst a group of penguins where a couple of winged creatures adopt it. They sit on the egg as if it were their offspring. Not intimidated, Grizzy and the Lemmings decide to get their hands on it, but the entire bird colony intervenes.

Bean accepts because hes starving hungry. How long can he keep up the deception? Long enough to fill his stomach?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Animation based on the highly popular live action series of the same name, with many of the same characters including the hapless Mr. Bean himself, his long-suffering girlfriend Irma Gobb, Teddy and the mysterious driver of the Reliant Supervan. Two new characters appear, Beans landlady Mrs Wicket and her evil one-eyed moggy Scrapper. The series features little actual dialogue, just the famous mumblings and mild slapstick.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. programme.title: Mr Bean

All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Pregnant Doc: During a chase, Specs accidentally swallows Lamput. The Docs plan to bring Lamput back to the lab! However, Specs gets misunderstood by bystanders as a pregnant mother in labor and gets dragged to a hospital against his will. While Specs gets used to being a mother-to-be, Skinny tries to get the two of them out of the hospital and back to the lab. Will Lamput stay in Specs tummy this whole time?Reverse: In a new attempt to catch Lamput, The Docs invent a remote that reverses anything back in time. Lamput must try to escape while constantly being pulled back into the Docs grasp!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Tuzki is back as the new intern at the lab. Specs and Skinny has a task for him but Tuzki gets completely lost. Lo and behold, Lamput is just around the corner to help Tuzki complete his mission which is to capture Lamput! Now Tuzki has to return the favour but how will he answer to his bosses?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and Skinny spruce themselves up and head out to a piano concerto in the royal concert hall. Theyre on their best behavior, until they spot a fellow culture vulture who also happens to be small, orange and squishy. Honestly, theyre letting all sorts of rabble into these places these days. The Docs decide that a sleeping potion might be a quick and quiet way of capturing Lamput. Naturally things get out of hand, and when the entire audience catches a whiff of the snoozy brew, we find out exactly how hard it is to stay awake during a classical music recital. One star.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput has escaped yet again, and yet again, Specs and Skinny are in serious trouble with the Boss. Hes so fed up with their constant failure that he hires an out-of-towner: a super cool, hi-tech Doc who has all the moves and the attitude to match. The new guys hip to all of Lamputs tricks, and before long, the shape shifting blob is safely back at the Lab. Specs and Skinny, robbed of their whole gig, end up on the streets, while Rival Doc gets all the glory. With glory comes blame, though, and when Lamput stages yet another signature crafty escape, the Boss turns all his fury on Rival Doc. Who hired this guy, anyway!? Lamput just wants things to be how they were. The orange blob helps the Docs get back their jobs at the Lab, Rival Doc is sent packing, and Lamput prepares yet another daring escape.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: While on vacation, The Looney Builders befriend Coco the Crab and offer to build her a mini-resort. They shrink down for a micro-build and must rely on the islands natural resources to get the job done.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The first episode of an animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. Mayor Foghorn Leghorn hires the Looney Builders to build a giant water slide for Looneyburgs water-park.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. The Batwheels have to learn to drive a mile in each others wheels after agreeing to swap motherboards and change bodies.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Snowy and Jestah team up to execute a mysterious plan involving rare freeze-berries, Batwing and Buff pair up to take on the dastardly duo. / Bibi has some competition with Nightwings motorcycle, Nightbike. These stunt bikes will need to learn that theyre better when they work together. F 3/3

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Hildie and Beatie commemorate the passing of their Mother and Tom tries to help out by bringing her back from the grave. She is so evil that the witches command Tom to make a spell to send her back. Tom and Jerry must find a way to send her back and must outwit the Moms evil spellbook bent on keeping her here.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom stars in a documentary that mischaracterises his daily activities.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Dr. Bigby invents a transporting machine that accidentally transports Jerry and Tom to Paris where they meet Gigi and Cozette. They fall in love but are transported back. Bot and Napoleon break the machine trying to get them back and then they have to figure out how to make the machine work again. Bot falls in love with a robot named Dee and tries to fix her.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Rick and Ginger are going on a vacation and bringing Tom and Spike aboard the plane. Stowaways Jerry and Tuffy are also along for the ride and things go awry when all the pets start chasing each other on the plane. Rick and Ginger are oblivious that their pets are annoying the entire plane.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry
programme.desc: Jerry fancies himself an artist, but Tom disagrees. Their artistic antics blur lines between art and chaos. Other than a trail of mess, what else will they leave behind?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is tidying his flat and chucking out a load of old unwanted junk. Unfortunately during the big clear out Teddy accidentally falls into a bin bag which gets put out in the street. Bean is horrified when the rubbish van arrives and he realises that dear old Teddy is now on his way to the landfill. Bean races across town to the dump but how will he ever find his friend amongst all the mountains of junk?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a robot to clean his flat, but it ends up trashing half the town.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van. But by the time he gets to the front of the queue the ice-cream man has gone to lunch. Bean takes it upon himself to climb through in an open window and into the back of the van from where he starts to help himself. Unfortunately he soon attracts a crowd and is forced to serve a long queue of kids until all the ice cream runs out. When the ice-cream man comes back from lunch and drives away he is unaware that Bean is still hiding in the back of his van en route to the ice cream factory.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Against his better judgement, Bean has agreed to go out on a proper date with Irma Gobb, his girlfriend. She has the perfect evening planned: a romantic film followed by a candlelit dinner for two. If only she had the perfect boyfriend to go with it.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: Tom is taking selfies and enjoying a sweet snack at the candy shop, when Jerry and Tuffy sneak up and eat his strawberries. Tom proceeds to chase after them, but Tuffy falls into the claw machine. Jerry tries to save him, and Tom fishes them out. Tom makes Tuffy cry and apologizes by feeding him sweets.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun destroying ice towers. When Grizzy sees them, it inspires him to sculpt statues of himself. The Lemmings cannot resist the temptation to destroy the statues of Grizzy, who does everything in his power to protect them.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A container adrift along the icefield will change the lives of Grizzy and the Lemmings: its an inexhaustible stock of chocolate spread! There is so much, that for the first time the close enemies have no need to fight over the treat. They entice a flock of penguins into hoisting the container out of the water. One of the penguins, who did not get his reward in fish, is disgruntled. Grizzy has him taste the Yummy, then throws the jar far away to get rid of the penguin. The chocolate treat spreads over the icefield. Fatal error?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy uses a fire extinguisher to chase the Lemmings from the living room so that he can take a nap, but the gadget accidentally flies out the window. It lands at the top of an ice cliff, causing a fissure, and the peak of the cliff topples. Amid the debris, the Lemmings discover a fearsome creature: the Yeti, who is looking for the guilty party. The Lemmings bring him to Grizzy, never dreaming that the giant will immediately fall in love with the Rangers cabin and throw a very original party.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are bored. A coconut rolls over to Grizzys feet, pulling the bear out of his state of torpor. He imagines a sort of face on the nut and decides to care for it, like a child with its doll. He has so much fun playing with his new toy that the Lemmings want to join in. But when the bear refuses, the Lemmings ruse: they hide inside other coconuts in hopes of being adopted by Grizzy!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While bickering with the Lemmings over control of the TV, Grizzy sees an illustration that gives him an idea. In a medical book, a person whose leg is in a cast is being served dinner in front of a TV. Grizzy pretends to have a twisted ankle and shows the Lemmings the patient care illustrations. The imaginary invalid Grizzy is so convincing that the Lemmings fall for the trick. They think that the sooner Grizzy is healed, the sooner they will be able to throw him out of the cabin as planned.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: On the beach, the Lemmings have set up a mini funfair for tourists. Each attraction lets you to win tickets, which are then used to collect prizes from a vending machine. Grizzy, who is not very good at games of skill, steals the tickets collected by the Lemmings in order to obtain the jackpot. The Lemmings decide to create an attraction just for him.

programme.title: Superthings Rivals of Kaboom, Kazoom Power
programme.desc: A battle among Superthings throws the new Kazoom Kids into a surreal world where everything they draw and erase... comes to life!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom is chasing the mice around the haunted house when midnight strikes, and he finds himself face-to-face with a green-faced beast whos just as surprised to encounter Tom. Its soon revealed to be Toodles, whos a good witch brewing magic beauty products. Although Tom is enchanted at first, things stop going smoothly when he helps with her potions.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry investigate the case of a missing pineapple in Hawaii. / Tom uses an unlucky bone to scare Spike and Jerry. / The Tom and Jerry detective agency take a case to locate a young tortoise who is secretly training to become a prize boxer. / Spike trains Tyke for a puppy dog competition with the help of Tom and Jerry. / Jerry gets a visit from his very hungry city cousin, Count De Calories, who goes wild with all the food in the manor. / The Tom and Jerry detective agency takes the case of a dog whose fortune cookie has gone missing. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry accidentally lose Gingers wedding ring down the drain. They send Jerry down the pipes to retrieve it but it gets sent down the drain to the sewers and to the beach. The pets must keep Rick and Ginger from using the water and then must continue to follow the ring all the way to the beach.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry
programme.sub-title: Tom and Jerry: Santas Little Helpers
programme.desc: Everyones favorite cat-and-mouse duo, Tom and Jerry, is joined by Nibbles Mouse, aka Tuffy, as they ring in a wild wintertime celebration in the all-new holiday special Santas Little Helpers. Jerry and Tuffy are living the good life in Santas workshop -- until the day Tom is rescued by the Claus family! With Tom in the house, theres nothing but merry mayhem at the North Pole. But when the dust settles, can the comically destructive duo work together to save Christmas and learn the true meaning of friendship? Directed by Darrel Van Citters and written by Jim Praytor and Robert Zappia, this wacky Tom and Jerry outing features the voice talents of Tom Kenny, Gary Cole, Simon Helberg, Julie Wittner, Grey DeLisle and Rachael MacFarlane.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own "No Littering" signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is very scared on a stormy night and even more so when he hears Mrs Wicket screaming from downstairs. Mr Bean investigates and finds the source of the problem...a rat! Mr Bean offers to help Mrs Wicket rid their house of the troublesome rodent. The only problem is the crafty rat is going nowhere fast and is always one step ahead. Mr Bean looks to inspiration from the Pied Piper but fairy stories dont always have happy endings.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentines Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irmas attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a "date" to the Valentines Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-tellers prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean forgets the golden rule: never fall asleep in the bath when youve got a chicken in the oven. So what romantic meal can he quickly rustle-up for his luckless girlfriend, Irma Gobb? The cheese from the mousetrap? The flower from the vase? A meal is eventually provided by an uninvited guest.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the rangers latest acquisition: a 3D printer that will duplicate anything at all in miniature format. Grizzy wants to redecorate the cabin with figurines bearing his effigy, but first he needs to get rid of the Lemmings. Without getting them mixed up with their perfect resin replicas.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a strange gateway to a parallel world. On the other side, there is the same cabin, only it doesnt belong to a ranger. Its a chocolate spread museum, where the curators are... another Grizzy and other Lemmings, all with very different personalities.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the rangers latest acquisition: a 3D printer that will duplicate anything at all in miniature form. / Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a strange gateway to a parallel world. On the other side there is the same cabin only it doesnt belong to a ranger. / Grizzy and the Lemmings clumsily destroy the TV remote control while fighting over who gets to watch his favorite program.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that by changing the speed limit sign on the side of the road they can create a huge draft that is just perfect for their extreme kiting game. / While trying to stop the Lemmings Grizzy slips on the canvas and unwittingly executes an amazing somersault in front of his beloved she-bear. / The Lemmings have hitched up a racoon with a sweet-tooth to their sled and get a ride by throwing cookies in front of the creature with a sling.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While trying to stop the Lemmings from playing their extreme trampoline game, Grizzy slips on the canvas and unwittingly executes an amazing somersault in front of his beloved she-bear. Seeing that she wants more, Grizzy decides to become a champ in the sport. But for that to happen, the Lemmings will need to let him work out.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have hitched up a racoon with a sweet-tooth to their sled and get a ride by throwing cookies in front of the creature with a sling. To recover the supply of cookies, which were to be his afternoon snack, Grizzy has no qualms about making the Lemmings sled skid out of control. When the sled hits a superheros spacecraft, a mysterious costume falls out.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have unearthed a strange little gadget from amongst the Forest Rangers belongings: a hand spinner. Grizzy thinks its a silly game until he accidentally tries out the contraption for himself and becomes instantly addicted. What is the secret of this seemingly banal object that make the heads of its enthusiasts spin as well?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and Skinny spruce themselves up and head out to a piano concerto in the royal concert hall. Theyre on their best behavior, until they spot a fellow culture vulture who also happens to be small, orange and squishy. Honestly, theyre letting all sorts of rabble into these places these days. The Docs decide that a sleeping potion might be a quick and quiet way of capturing Lamput. Naturally things get out of hand, and when the entire audience catches a whiff of the snoozy brew, we find out exactly how hard it is to stay awake during a classical music recital. One star.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi and Batwing must work together to get past the Legion of Zoom in order to deliver a new giant screen to Batcomputer. / Bam must lead a new super vehicle team consisting of Nightbike, Goldie, Grundy, and Kitty after the Legion of Zoom traps the rest of the Batwheels in the Batcave. F 3/3

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.sub-title: Save the Bat Dance for Me
programme.desc: Redbird is convinced that nobody likes his eccentric dance moves, but when Toyman traps Robin behind a dance-themed gauntlet, its up to the rally car to dance his way to victory! / After Nightbike reveals that hes afraid of loud noises, the Batwheels help him overcome his fear so he can stop The Penguin from strealing some valuable cargo. F 3/3

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Nightbike reveals that hes afraid of loud noises, the Batwheels help him overcome his fear so he can stop The Penguin from strealing some valuable cargo.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Feeling insecure about his size after a game of Hide-And-Seek, Buff uses the shrink belt belonging to The Atom and accidentally shrinks himself down to the size of a mouse! / Redbird struggles to stop Poison Ivys diabolical schemes because he wants to be in the spotlight. F 3/3

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. The Looney Builders are hired by Penelope Pussycat to build a fashion runway in France where they are encouraged to make a design that is both bigger and more fun.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Chef Poyung Panda hires The Looney Builders to build her a Dim Sum bus in China. Bugs worries about letting down his favorite chef. / Sharko has a secret dream… he wants to do a water ballet! / Zig befriends a Yeti who helps him get closer to the mermaid… / Marina and Sharko go on holiday… to a campsite. Marina is disappointed: she would have preferred a five-star hotel. Guess who their neighbours are? Zig and Bernie! / Bernie wanders off into an amusement park… / Nothing seems to be biting Grizzys fishing rod and the bear is in despair. Suddenly he spots a fabulous swordfish swimming in the lagoon. / The Lemmings slide along the Great Wall in a crate. / An unexpected guest whirled Masha and everyone who met on her way in a dance. She made Bear remember his youth and disturbed the calmness of the She-Bear. Who is this stranger? / When we crave for adventures and new experiences, we take sleeping bags and a tent and go camping. We will admire amazing landscapes, climb a mountain and even see real volcanoes! / Masha decides celebrating New Year once is not enough and goes to mysterious China, where dragons dance, gardens bloom and many, many more interesting things are happening! / Its the perfect day to go on a Summer field trip! JJ and friends are having fun with sea animals at the beach. Sing along with us! / A health inspector calls on the Hotel; Tom and Jerry go to a mini-golf park; a swan befriends Jerry; Spike fancies himself a Canine King.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: As The Looney Builders build a giant claw game for Chibi Critters arcade in Japan, they discover the claw part is broken. / Sharko misses the ocean. So when to boat crashes and sinks under the sea hes delighted! / Marina is fascinated by train models. Zig and Bernie turn up with a miniature train that actually works. Marina climbs aboard with Sharko, who bars Zig and Bernie from the trip. / Sharko cant emerge from a recurring pie-in-the-face dream. / How did Bernie end up on the sea floor in the first place? / Grizzy has run out of ideas to open his coconut until he sees the Lemmings new friend the crab open one with a simple snip of the claw. / The Lemmings create a shadow puppet show where seven papercut lemmings confront a bear over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread. / Masha tries to comprehend the centuries-old wisdom and sets off in search of enlightenment in the magical land of India, where she will find many new experiences and discoveries. / Somebody terribly scary has climbed into the house of Penguin and made a terrible mess there! / To cure her beloved assistant, Masha goes to a mysterious and amazing eastern country. But the answers to the most difficult questions are simpler than they seem at first glance. / The little ducklings are learning the safe way to cross the street today! Join in and sing along! / Tom has a nightmare about a super-intelligent mouse takeover. Jerry inherits a hamster ball. A chase through NYC turns into a musical tribute.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders rush to build a soccer stadium in Mexico for their fast customer, Speedy Gonzalez. / Marina makes a documentary about the North Pole with Sharko. / Marina fantasizes about winter sports. Sharko transforms the volcano into a ski resort. Zig is delighted: this is an incredible opportunity! / Sharko and Marina want to perform as a figure skating duo. / Will Bernie stop at nothing to win the talent contest? / Before an audience of penguins and walruses, two teams of Lemmings perform acrobatic high jumps, competing for the winning prize. / The Lemmings are holding a log throwing competition that stops short when Grizzy sends them soaring into the distance. / It is interesting to know how your favorite characters will behave if you find yourself in the wild West. Who will be a sheriff, who is a robber, and who is a fighter for justice? / On a nice summers day Bear, as usual, goes fishing and Masha follows alongside. But the fishing trip didnt quite work out. / When its winter and cold outside, hot drinks arent the only ones who can warm you up. Take a trip into hot memories of Mexico. Masha and the Bear arent afraid of cold weather. / Its summer! Lets go to the beach! Its time for some fun under the sun! / Tom is to keep a chimp away from bananas; Tom takes Spikes place in a dog contest; A musical frolic in the snow; Toots is determined to catch Jerry.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom is watching a hypnotist on TV, when the words "you are asleep" hit him hard. He becomes a virtual rag doll and ends up in a jumble of junk for Rick and Gingers yard sale. A woman who thinks hes a stuffed animal buys him. Jerry feels bad and hops aboard the car to rescue Tom.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom falls asleep inside a rolled-up carpet left out on the curb by Rick with a "free" sign attached. When the new owners unload their pickup truck and leave the carpet in front of their home, a sleepy Tom doesnt notice at first that everything is similar to, but a little different than, his usual surroundings. Soon Tom feels that hes landed in bizarro world.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After a series of beatings from Tom, Jerry storms off into his mouse hole. Soon he falls asleep and dreams himself to be the Lord of Downton Abbey! Tom is now servant to Lord Jerry, and the Master wastes no time in making Toms life miserable. Tom is caught in the act of exacting revenge, so Lord Jerry challenges Tom to a duel in the dream world.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Jerry is feeling lonely and wishes he had a girlfriend. Spike explains spring fever to Tom and they leave him be. Jerrys mood improves when he gets a message from his brawny cousin Muscles, who has fixed him up with his girlfriends friend for a double date.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Jerrys country cousins visit the Abbey, the cook is convinced Downton is in the midst of a vermin invasion! Cates (the butler) presses Tom into service with the threat of becoming a stable cat otherwise. Tom pursues the cunning, feisty bumpkins, and Jerry, throughout the manor, and they delight in making surprise appearances to Tom in awkward moments.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Jerry discovers the mysterious phobia cats have toward cucumbers and is inspired to try it out on Tom. After freaking Tom out repeatedly, Butch steps in to counsel Tom and help him overcome his fear, only Butch is far from immune himself. The two encounter more and more trouble as they deal with their phobia.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Animated series for younger viewers. Ellas mum is a hall of fame Enceladus 500 race champion, and Ella wants to be just like her! She plans to skate, scooter race and geyser jump her way to a championship trophy!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ella and Slippy have been practicing their rock-climbing skills, so that they can tackle the recently formed, huge crater on Saturns moon, Enceladus. Ella, however, prefers relying on her space boots to get her to the top of the rock wall

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Animated series for younger viewers. One little rock can cause a chain reaction by hitting bigger and bigger pieces. Ella inadvertently sends a rock on a collision course for Saturns moon, Prometheus. Thats where Ellas dad has gone to work on a stalled vehicle.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: After hurting her leg, Ella has to take it easy for an entire day. Does she have the patience to sit and rest for that long? When she runs out of activities at home, Ellas dad offers to take her along on one of his towing operations

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: When Glitchs arm shorts out, Ellas dad has the right tools to fix him. While hes at it, Dad shows off his latest creation, a Super Towing Arm. Slippy is impressed and Glitch is more than happy to try it on for size

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Toad boasts he can get to the seaside in his hot air ballon and be back in time for his grand dinner. He soon gets into trouble and crash lands in the Wild Woods. Trapped in the ropes and branches of trees, Toad is helpless to stop the weasels marching on Toad Hall.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Toad boasts he can get to the seaside in his hot air ballon and be back in time for his grand dinner. He soon gets into trouble and crash lands in the Wild Woods. / Toad commissions a portrait of himself from Mrs Otter but cant keep still enough for her to paint him. Will there ever be a portrait of Toad hanging in Toad Hall?

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: When Toad throws out an old chair, he immediately regrets it but the Weasels have now claimed it. Can Toad and his friends persuade them to return it to him? / Badger finds an old dirty painting of the Riverbankers ancestors as a choir and Ratty offers to put a new choir together.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Badger finds an old dirty painting of the Riverbankers ancestors as a choir and Ratty offers to put a new choir together. Chief and Tinker wont let him Smudge join. Only a full restoration of the painting will reveal who really was in the The Wild Wood Warblers!

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Toad volunteers to babysit Portly for the Otters only to find babysitting isnt as easy as it looks.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to take Teddy on holiday to the seaside. But when he arrives at his hotel a spoilt little girl wants Teddy all for herself. And her protective dad only wants the best for his princess. An on-going tussle ensues between Mr Bean the little girl and her Dad resulting in a chase across the seaside town and onto the pier. No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their "relaxing" holiday!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr Bean. Mr Bean is left in peace when Mrs Wicket goes off on her holidays. This means Mr Bean has free access to her daily newspaper. Every time he goes down to collect it from the letterbox it has disappeared. Someone is taking it, but who? Mr Bean is determined to nab the mysterious newspaper stealer and uses a range of ingenious homemade traps in his quest to catch the sneaky thief.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to find a nice quiet place to read his book so he sets off for the Library. But instead of reading he becomes distracted by some funny online videos he sees on the Librarys computer. Before he knows it Mr Bean is recording his own video which is uploaded for everyone to see. Things start to go crazy when people check out his funny video and his popularity takes off. But does Mr Bean enjoy being in the public eye and how long will his celebrity last?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is obsessed by his favourite TV hero "Super Spy" and is excited when his very own Super-Spy spy kit arrives in the post. While Mr Bean is pretending to be his favourite character and delighting in all his gadgets he spots some unusual goings on in the Bruisers house next door. Naturally Mr Bean assumes the worst and sets out to rectify the situation.
